profile:
Jash Design & Build Inc. is a full service Design/Build firm serving the GTA areas. Our skilled team of architects, designers and craftsmen share a commitment to customer service, made manifest through seven core principles: Courtesy, Accountability, Integrity in Design, Quality Craftsmanship, Communication, Cleanliness and Accessibility. 

This commitment has helped us build a broad base of loyal clients who continue to refer family and friends. We thank you for considering Jash Design & Build, and invite you to tour our online gallery by clicking on our website link.

Residential - Commercial Design & Build from layouts, plans, and 3D modeling, all the way through to specification, construction and job completion. 
Residential: Custom Homes, Additions, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements and more….. 
Commercial: Restaurants, Salons, Spas, offices and more….

Custom water features
Custom condo builds
